{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Wistron NeWeb |model=AP-300G |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/09/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=NKRAP300G,M4Y-XG-600 |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=IDT |cpu1_model=79RC32V333-150DH |cpu1_cspeed=150 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XG-600 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8100BL |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''IEEE 802.11b/g Enterprise Access Point'' - '''AirWolf''' (RA-8)
[http://web.archive.org/web/20040227230756/http://www.wneweb.com/wireless/products/w-ap300g.htm Product page (via archive.org)]
[http://web.archive.org/web/20040229091831/http://www.wneweb.com/wireless/products/print/ap300g.pdf Datasheet (via archive.org)] [http://www.practicallynetworked.com/item.asp?pid=541 On Practically Networked] ([http://www.wi-fiplanet.com/reviews/AP/article.php/3065771 review])
[http://www.wi-fiplanet.com/reviews/AP/article.php/3065771/Wistron-NeWeb-AirWolf.htm Review on Wi-Fi Planet from 2003] Default credentials are from the FCC submitted manual. :The OS is specified as Linux 2.4.18.
